title: Define Project Scope and Requirements: AI Tutoring Companion
description: Investigate the detailed technical requirements for the AI Tutoring Companion. Identify the target audience (corporate employees engaged in skill-building programs), learning domains (based on user needs, company objectives, and potential market trends), desired features (personalized learning paths, real-time feedback, adaptive difficulty levels, integration with existing HR systems, LMS platforms, and possibly collaboration tools such as Slack or Microsoft Teams). Consider potential future scalability, the need for data privacy and security, compliance with accessibility standards, and the potential impact of AI on user engagement and learning outcomes. Upon completion, prepare a comprehensive document detailing these findings, including performance benchmarks, edge cases, and potential challenges in implementation. Incorporate feedback from the project manager, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer. Upon approval, present the final document to the task-decomposer for further task decomposition. If necessary, suggest additional tasks or dependencies. Update the rfc_state field to 'APPROVED_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION' once approved. **Additional Recommendations:** Include a section on potential AI models and algorithms suitable for this project, such as machine learning techniques for skill recommendation and adaptive learning paths, and reinforcement learning for real-time feedback, as well as the possibility of integrating with popular collaboration tools like Slack or Microsoft Teams. **Update**: Suggested additional task: 'Explore the feasibility of using natural language processing (NLP) to enhance user interaction.'

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including the AI model, user interface, data storage, and integration with learning management systems.

title: Implement AI Tutoring Model
description: Develop and train the AI model for personalized tutoring, including natural language processing, knowledge representation, and adaptive learning algorithms.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create the user interface for the AI Tutoring Companion, including the learning platform, interactive tutoring sessions, and progress tracking.

title: Implement Data Storage and Integration
description: Set up the data storage system and integrate with existing learning management systems to manage user data, course materials, and tutoring sessions.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of the AI Tutoring Companion.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the AI Tutoring Companion adheres to data privacy and security regulations, including user authentication, data encryption, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the AI Tutoring Companion to various environments.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive user guides, tutorials, and training materials to support the adoption and effective use of the AI Tutoring Companion.
